item.description:
Do you like Greek food? Have you always wanted to try it? 

It's absolutely delicious!

 

On Thursday evenings the Athenian Corner presents 'Concerts On The Corner." It's become quite popular. And it's always a good time!  They also have their regular weekly entertainment, "The Athenian Ensemble" along with belly dancing later in the evening.  The  atmosphere dining inside  is close to family-style. I've hosted events at this venue, and it's always been a great time!         Check out the menu @: www.atheniancorner.com


Music outside begins at 7 pm
Music inside starts at 8pm

***THE CONCERT IS FREE. However, being  a restaurant and bar.  it's expected that you purchase  drinks, appetizers, a meal or all***********************************

 

I will NOT be making a reservation.  If we are seated outside, depending on the number of RSVP we may need several tables. If we are inside, we definitely should all be able to be seated together. Please be advised that  which ever way this goes, there may be a short wait for any table.

*Parking: The restaurant has a small side lot. Otherwise, parking would be on the strett or public garage.  contact # is: 978.289.7679 after 6:00 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a meetup.com pin @ the front entrance at 6:45. If you want to join us later,that's fine- phone the number below.
item.name: Concert & More On The Corner @ The Athenian Corner (Lowell)
